title.narrative: Support till Liberia Revenue Authority - Inception fas
Support to Liberia Revenue Authority - Inception phase

description.narrative: Syftet med insatsen är att bättre förstå de möjliga samarbetsområdena där Sverige genom Skatteverket kan bidra till att stärka Liberia Revenue Authority (LRA) priorteringar med fokus på kapacitetsuppbyggnad och utbyte av erfarenheter. Utgångspunkten för eventuellt stöd och samarbete är den svenska strategin för samarbete med Liberia 2016-2020.

The purpose of the fact-finding missions is to outline the possible cooperation areas where Sweden through the Swedish Tax Agency can contribute to strengthening the Liberia Revenue Authority (LRA) priorities with a focus on capacity building and exchange of experiences. The point of departure for any support and cooperation is the Swedish Strategy for Cooperation with Liberia 2016-2020.

The purpose of the fact-finding missions is to outline the possible cooperation areas where Sida/Embassy of Sweden in Liberia and the Swedish Tax Authority (STA) could contribute to strengthening the Liberia Revenue Authority (LRA) with a focus on capacity building and exchange of experiences. The objectives of the fact-finding intervention was: - To establish contact with key staff at LRA and other relevant stakeholders as well as the Embassy of Sweden and other donors of importance for designing the possible future support. - To collect information on LRA, the tax system in Liberia, and the context where LRA is operating, make strategic analysis of the current situation and needs. - To Identify areas of possible Swedish support. - To prepare a draft project document that includes exchange of experiences and the future modalities of cooperation. - To prepare a project proposal for funding of an inception phase in 2020, encompassing all matters that is needed for Sidas decision in this matter.

tag.narrative: 17.1 - Strengthen domestic resource mobilization, including through international support to developing countries, to improve domestic capacity for tax and other revenue collection.
17.1 - Stärka den inhemska resursmobiliseringen, inklusive genom internationellt stöd till utvecklingsländerna, för att förbättra den inhemska kapaciteten att ta upp skatter och andra intäkter.

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The project established important working relations between the key stakeholders, the STA and LRA and also the Embassy of Sweden, by undertaking of reciprocal study tours and fact finding missions and information gathering, which resulted in a project document and proposal for an inception phase for support to the LRA.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
